purpose: Facilitate advanced codebase analysis and search to enhance developer productivity and tool creation
principle: Utilizes static code analysis and AI techniques to map codebases and extract meaningful symbols for search and analysis
reusability: Offers APIs and tools for integration into custom developer tools and workflows
limitations: Primarily focused on Python codebases; may have limited support for other languages
name: kit
description: The toolkit for codebase mapping, symbol extraction, and many kinds of code search. Build AI-powered devtools :ship:
highlight: Comprehensive toolkit for codebase mapping and symbol extraction with AI-powered code search capabilities
